title: Aromatherapy - Naturopathic Therapy - Donna Bach | Naturopath and Personal Coach in Jamestown

cleaned_text: In aromatherapy, natural plan extracts are used to promote health and well-being. This holistic treatment targets physical and emotional health by understanding that each essential oil has unique properties, uses and effects. My experience in the field has allowed me to deliver successful aromatherapy sessions for many years. Thank you for your interest in my services! I'd love to hear from you. Leave your message through the form below.
